name: Apollo 24|7
description:
Apollo 24|7 is a part of the multi-specialty healthcare group Apollo Hospitals with the core belief that Expertise is for Everyone. With the launch of Apollo 24|7, the vision of our founder Dr Prathap C Reddy of removing mobility barriers from healthcare has become a reality.

Apollo 24|7 helps you get treated from Apollo certified doctors at any time of the day, wherever you are. The mobile app has features like E- consultation, online pharmacy, home diagnostic test and digital vault where you can upload all your medical history.
Headline: Always caring about your health, we are here to help you!
ShortDescription: Apollo 24|7 helps you get treated from Apollo certified doctors at any time of the day, wherever you are. The mobile app has features like E- consultation, online pharmacy, home diagnostic test and digital vault where you can upload all your medical history.

Highlights.name: Largest Online Pharmacy In India
Highlights.description: With more than 5,600 stores in India, Apollo Pharmacy is not just the largest online pharmacy store in India but in Asia as well. Our pharmacy chain has been operational and been providing genuine quality healthcare products for more than 39 years.

Highlights.name: Most Trusted Online Medical Store Of India
Highlights.description: As pioneers in the healthcare segment, we understand the importance of trust.. We ensure that every product sold through our stores are checked for their authenticity, quality, and compliance with the Central Drugs Standard Control Organization, the national regulatory body for Indian pharmaceuticals and medical devices.

Highlights.name: 100% Genuine Medicine From Apollo Pharmacy
Highlights.description: All medicines/healthcare products sold on Apollo Pharmacy are procured from our sister company - Apollo Pharmacy, with a reputation of selling only 100% genuine products.

enhanced_description: Apollo 24|7, an integral part of the renowned multi-specialty healthcare group Apollo Hospitals, is a mobile application designed to overcome mobility barriers in healthcare by providing convenient access to medical services. Launched in 2020, the platform offers e-consultations with Apollo certified doctors, an online pharmacy for genuine medicines, and home diagnostic test services. It also includes a digital vault for secure management of personal medical history and a premium healthcare program called CIRCLE. Leveraging the extensive network of Apollo Pharmacy, it claims to be the largest online pharmacy in India and Asia, and the most trusted online medical store, ensuring the authenticity and quality of products in compliance with the Central Drugs Standard Control Organization (CDSCO). This service is positioned as a Total Rewards offering to improve employee happiness and engagement.

Scheduling and conducting diagnostic tests at employees' homes
Digital storage and management of employee medical history
Providing a premium healthcare program as an employee benefit
